Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine example_initial_conditions.fill_gaussian ( real(STM_REAL),dimension(nloc),intent(out)  vals,
integer,intent(in)  nloc,
real(STM_REAL),intent(in)  origin,
real(STM_REAL),intent(in)  dx,
real(STM_REAL),intent(in)  mean,
real(STM_REAL),intent(in)  sd 
)

Fill array with 1D gaussian shape This routine expects a 1D array, so multi-constituents have to be initialized separately.

Parameters:
vals values to be filled
origin origin (lo side of channel)
dx dx
mean center of the gaussian shape
sd length of gaussian shape
